site.title: Free IQ Test (ICAR-based)
site.tagline: A brief, public‑domain IQ estimate — multilingual and free.
disclaimer: This is a brief, non‑proctored screening using public‑domain items (ICAR). Scores are approximate and not a clinical or educational assessment.
icar.i1.prompt: What comes next in the number series? 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
result.title: Your IQ estimate
